de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.similarityfunction

Class AbstractVectorDoubleSimilarityFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.similarityfunction.AbstractPrimitiveSimilarityFunction<NumberVector<?>,DoubleDistance>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.similarityfunction.AbstractVectorDoubleSimilarityFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrimitiveDoubleSimilarityFunction<NumberVector<?>>, PrimitiveSimilarityFunction<NumberVector<?>,DoubleDistance>, SimilarityFunction<NumberVector<?>,DoubleDistance>, Parameterizable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Kulczynski1SimilarityFunction, Kulczynski2SimilarityFunction, LaplaceKernelFunction, PolynomialKernelFunction, RadialBasisFunctionKernelFunction, RationalQuadraticKernelFunction, SigmoidKernelFunction

    public abstract class AbstractVectorDoubleSimilarityFunction
extends AbstractPrimitiveSimilarityFunction<NumberVector<?>,DoubleDistance>
implements PrimitiveDoubleSimilarityFunction<NumberVector<?>>
    Abstract base class for double-valued primitive similarity functions.
